name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live ＂LOCK ON＂ 有明アリーナ [DpYSUe6Ca9o]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: A vibrant montage showcasing various fan messages and illustrations supporting Amane Kanata's first solo live performance.
An "ATTENTION" screen providing information for concert attendees regarding flashing lights and cheering rules.
A screen displaying details for the second round of "LOCK ON" live merchandise sales.
The montage of fan messages resumes, featuring the "LOCK ON" logo surrounded by colorful support notes.

subtitles.original:
ATTENTION
ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english:
Please be aware of flashing lights
during the performance.
